name: Help With Getting Epic Dodge on level 24
author: Bawookles

posts.author: Bawookles
posts.content:
Hey, there.

So I want to do a Monk 20/Shadowdancer 5/ Cleric 15 build and I want to get Epic Dodge on level 24.

I start my Monk with Dex 18 and pump it up every chance I get so I can get to the Dex 25 requirement for Epic Dodge. So on 20th level I get him to Dex 23, I give him the Greater Dexterity feat on level 21 to get him to Dex 24 and by level 24 I can get him to Dex 25 so no problem there.

I have been adding to tumble on every level to get to 30 ranks. I already have improved evasion from the monk levels and the fifth level of Shadowdancer gets him the defensive roll feat necessary for Epic Dodge.

So, I'm testing this all out and on the 24th level I give him his 5th Shadowdancer level, I give him Dex 25 and.... when I get to feat selection Epic Dodge is not available!!!

What am I doing wrong??? Do I have to have tumble at 30 UNMODIFIED ranks for the feat? And thus won't be able to get Epic Dodge until level 27???

Thanks!

posts.author: Bawookles
posts.content: Arghh! Okay, nevermind I just figured it out. Yeah, it's the unmodified Skill ranks for the feat. Duh. So I can get Epic Dodge at level 27. Sorry if I wasted anyone's time!
